BANKING FRAUD AWARENESS GUIDELINES

Banking fraud refers to unauthorized transactions conducted with the intent to deceive customers.

Common Types of Fraud:
- Phishing emails and messages
- Fake phone calls asking for OTP
- ATM card skimming
- Online payment frauds

Safety Guidelines:
- Never share OTP, PIN, or CVV.
- Do not click on suspicious links.
- Verify bank communication through official channels.
- Report fraud immediately to the bank.

Banks and RBI regularly issue advisories to protect customers from fraud.
